>
[Distracting Feint](/Feats.aspx?ID=4925) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rogue" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=687" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 171 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[scoundrel racket](/Rackets.aspx?ID=2)

</column>

---

Your Feints are far more distracting than normal. While a creature is off-guard by your Feint, it also takes a –2 circumstance penalty to Perception checks and Reflex saves.
